'''projects'''

i wrote an Ubuntu Live CD creator called "reconstructor".  it uses the Ubuntu Live CD as a foundation, and allows customization.  For instance, custom gnome settings (gdm, wallpaper, fonts, etc.), custom software, custom apt repositories, and more.
